mapper.select: select c1.id as c1_id, c1.pid as c1_pid, c1.ppid as c1_ppid, c1.futuresId as c1_futuresId, c1.userId as c1_userId, c1.content as c1_content, c1.date as c1_date, u1.id as u1_id, u1.phone as u1_phone, u1.nickName as u1_nickName, c2.id as c2_id, c2.pid as c2_pid, c2.ppid as c2_ppid, c2.futuresId as c2_futuresId, c2.userId as c2_userId, c2.content as c2_content, c2.date as c2_date, u2.id as u2_id, u2.phone as u2_phone, u2.nickName as u2_nickName from comment as c1 left join user as u1 on c1.userId=u1.id left join comment as c2 on c1.pid=c2.id left join user as u2 on c2.userId=u2.id WHERE c1.futuresId=#{futuresId} AND c1.id < #{startCommentId} ORDER BY c1.id DESC LIMIT 30
